Ruby.en: A brutal ramming attack using out-thrust horns.

Sapphire.en: A brutal ramming attack using out-thrust horns.

Emerald.en: A brutal ramming attack using out-thrust horns.

FireRed.en: A brutal ramming attack delivered with a tough and impressive horn.
FireRed.de: Brutaler Rammangriff mit spitzem, beeindruckenden [sic!] Horn.

LeafGreen.en: A brutal ramming attack delivered with a tough and impressive horn.
LeafGreen.de: Brutaler Rammangriff mit spitzem, beeindruckenden [sic!] Horn.

Diamond.en: Utilizing its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the foe with no letup.
Diamond.de: Brutaler Rammangriff mit spitzem, beeindruckendem Horn.
